#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
using namespace std;

void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
int main()
{
    int test,n;
    scanint(test);
    while(test--)
    {
        scanint(n);
        if(n==1 || n==0)
        {
            printf("NO\n");
        }
        else printf("YES\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
